welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Erie, Canada! Get ready to experience our charming city known for its breathtaking views, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Fort Erie has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at St Catharines Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting the network name and entering the provided password.
